name: node-js-backend
description: This project involves developing the backend services for an application using Node.js. The backend will handle server-side logic, database interactions, authentication, API endpoints, and other critical functionalities required to support the frontend and ensure seamless user experiences. The project aims to build a robust, scalable, and maintainable backend infrastructure that adheres to best practices in Node.js development, including modularization, error handling, and performance optimization.
author: Muhammad Salman
